displayName.value: Azure Security Benchmark - Platform Management (Audit Mode)

assignmentDescription.value: Azure Security Benchmark v3 assigned to Platform Management management group in audit-only mode. Focuses on logging, monitoring, backup, and governance controls for platform management resources including Log Analytics, Azure Monitor, and Automation accounts.

value.message: Platform management resource is not compliant with Azure Security Benchmark v3. Review logging, monitoring, and governance controls and implement required security configurations.
